title: How to make an Arduino car from scratch?
description: Learn how to create a customized Arduino-powered car from scratch. This course covers the basics of electronics, programming, and mechanical assembly to bring your own robotic car to life.

title: Internet of Things (IoT) Fundamentals
description: Explore the world of IoT and learn how to build connected devices. This course covers sensor integration, data communication, and IoT application development.

title: Advanced Electronics Design
description: Take your electronics design skills to the next level. This course focuses on circuit design, PCB layout, and practical implementation of advanced electronic systems.

title: Robotics Masterclass: Building and Programming Robots
description: Delve into the fascinating world of robotics. Learn to build and program robots for various applications, from simple tasks to complex movements.

title: Embedded Systems Development
description: Master the art of embedded systems programming. This course covers microcontroller programming, real-time systems, and interfacing with peripherals.
